name: DFContinuousForceTouchGestureRecognizer
summary: Extension of UIGestureRecognizer that recognizes a force touch gesture and provides continuous updates regarding touch force changes.
description: iOS Force Touch gesture recognizer that will stream force updates to the delegate for the user's finger pressure changes. It gives you the capability to detect force touch and monitor pressure changes on a view in order to adapt your ui for an added dimension of interaction. This is only useful for running on a physical device that supports force touch.
